etomica.normalmode

Class NormalModes1DHR

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.NormalModes1DHR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NormalModes

    public class NormalModes1DHR
extends java.lang.Object
implements NormalModes
    Normal-mode quantities for a 1-dimensional system of hard rods. Frequencies are defined in terms of pair correlations (S matrix), which is given using an analytic solution.

      double[][][] getEigenvectors()

      Returns a factory that provides the wave vectors and coefficients for the periodic system.

    • Method Detail

      • getOmegaSquared

        public double[][] getOmegaSquared()
        Description copied from interface: NormalModes
        Returns an array giving the frequencies (squared) corresponding to the normal-mode motions. First index indicates the wave vector, and second index indicates the eigenvector. Length of second index is coordinateDim.
        Specified by:
        getOmegaSquared in interface NormalModes

      • getEigenvectors

        public double[][][] getEigenvectors()
        Description copied from interface: NormalModes
        First index corresponds to the wave vector; second index gives the eigenvector, and third index gives the elements of the vector. Length of 2nd and 3rd dimensions is coordinateDim.
        Specified by:
        getEigenvectors in interface NormalModes

      • setHarmonicFudge

        public void setHarmonicFudge(double newHarmonicFudge)
        Description copied from interface: NormalModes
        Set the fudge factor applied to frequencies. The squared-frequencies returned by getOmegaSquared will be the nominal values divided by the given fudge factor. Thus a smaller value of this fudge factor will make for "tighter" harmonic springs, corresponding to to smaller deviation from the lattice sites.
        Specified by:
        setHarmonicFudge in interface NormalModes

      • getWaveVectorFactory

        public WaveVectorFactory getWaveVectorFactory()
        Description copied from interface: NormalModes
        Returns a factory that provides the wave vectors and coefficients for the periodic system.
        Specified by:
        getWaveVectorFactory in interface NormalModes

      • setTemperature

        public void setTemperature(double newTemperature)
        Description copied from interface: NormalModes
        Set the temperature used for calculating omega-squared. Omega-squared is kT/eigenvalue.
        Specified by:
        setTemperature in interface NormalModes

      • S1DHR

        public static double S1DHR(int m,
                           double L,
                           int N)
        Returns the analytical result for the S matrix (just a scalar in this case) for the 1D HR system with PBC
        Parameters:
        m - specification of the wave vector, such that k = 2 Pi m rho/N
        L - lenth of the system
        N - number of rods

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
